      • checkBluetoothSupport

        private boolean checkBluetoothSupport(android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter bluetoothAdapter)
        Verify the level of Bluetooth support provided by the hardware.
        Parameters:
        bluetoothAdapter - System BluetoothAdapter.
        Returns:
        true if Bluetooth is properly supported, false otherwise.
